comments:
While offline or when having network issues, bugzilla connector is dumping stuff like below to the Eclipse log.

Could not determine modified tasks for https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs. [Thu Jun 22 07:39:38 EDT 2006]

java.net.SocketTimeoutException: connect timed out
	at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.socketConnect(Native Method)
	at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.doConnect(PlainSocketImpl.java:333)
	at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.connectToAddress(PlainSocketImpl.java:195)
	at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.connect(PlainSocketImpl.java:182)
	at java.net.Socket.connect(Socket.java:516)
	at sun.net.NetworkClient.doConnect(NetworkClient.java:152)
	at sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.openServer(HttpClient.java:365)
	at sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.openServer(HttpClient.java:477)
	at sun.net.www.protocol.https.HttpsClient.<init>(HttpsClient.java:278)
	at sun.net.www.protocol.https.HttpsClient.New(HttpsClient.java:335)
	at sun.net.www.protocol.https.AbstractDelegateHttpsURLConnection.getNewHttpClient(AbstractDelegateHttpsURLConnection.java:176)
	at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.plainConnect(HttpURLConnection.java:774)
	at sun.net.www.protocol.https.AbstractDelegateHttpsURLConnection.connect(AbstractDelegateHttpsURLConnection.java:162)
	at sun.net.www.protocol.https.HttpsURLConnectionImpl.connect(HttpsURLConnectionImpl.java:133)
	at org.eclipse.mylar.internal.bugzilla.core.AbstractReportFactory.collectResults(AbstractReportFactory.java:66)
	at org.eclipse.mylar.internal.bugzilla.ui.search.RepositoryQueryResultsFactory.performQuery(RepositoryQueryResultsFactory.java:53)
	at org.eclipse.mylar.internal.bugzilla.ui.tasklist.BugzillaRepositoryConnector.queryForChanged(BugzillaRepositoryConnector.java:446)
	at org.eclipse.mylar.internal.bugzilla.ui.tasklist.BugzillaRepositoryConnector.getChangedSinceLastSync(BugzillaRepositoryConnector.java:433)
	at org.eclipse.mylar.provisional.tasklist.AbstractRepositoryConnector.synchronizeChanged(AbstractRepositoryConnector.java:406)
	at org.eclipse.mylar.internal.tasklist.ScheduledTaskListSynchJob.run(ScheduledTaskListSynchJob.java:93)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:58)

Rob, I'm also getting lots of these: Mylar: Timeout retrieving description for: https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/attachment.cgi?id=43549&action=view, source: org.eclipse.mylar.internal.web.WebResourceManager$2

We need to handle these things gracefully instead of polluting the log (e.g. by leaving the synchronizing/italic decoration on the task).
Mik, some of the changes made yesturday should have reduced the frequency of the timeout errors. Let me know what you see.
Url description retrieval time out no longer logged, upon failure the url itself is used

Committed:
-- Background sync now ignores UnknownHostException and NoRouteToHostException.
-- User initiated sync leaves task name as italic if either of these two occur, any other errors are logged. Italics removed when back online and sync is successful.
Fixed. Offline io related errors no longer logged.

Created an attachment (id=46306)
mylar/context/zip

error handling when offline
